Social And Cultural Activities: Effective supporter of women empowerment groups. Interest in rural developement.
Party Name: All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam(AIADMK)
Special Interests: Reading books, participating in health awareness programmes and consumer protection movements.
Educational Qualifications: B.Sc., B.L. Educated at Alagappa College, Pushpam College and Madras Law College, Tamil Nadu
Other Information: Actively participating in political events from college days. An Active member of AIADMK from 1972. At present, organizing secretary AIADMK party
